title: Spin Control
description: Valerie Winslow never thought life in the tiny country of Schwerinborg could be so great.But then she never thought she would be dating the prince of Schwerinborg either! Georg, a real prince, is also her first real boyfriend.And then everything falls apart. Georg's decided they need to cool off for a while and her dad's sending her back to Virginia to visit her mom.Valerie's bummed—until she decides to go out with her old crush, David Anderson. David may not be a prince, but maybe he'll take her mind off of Georg—or will he?
author: Niki Burnham
